europeana:record.dc:title: [Proceedings of the VII international symposium 'Cultural heritage in geosciences, mining and metallurgy : libraries, archives, museums' : "Museums and their collections" held at the Nationaal Natuurhistorisch Museum Leiden (The Netherlands), 19-23 May, 2003 / Cor F. Winkler Prins and Stephen K. Donovan (editors)]: The archival documents of the State Central Mining Archives in Banská Stiavnica related to different kinds of museum collections at home and abroad
Scripta Geologica. Special Issue
europeana:record.dc:creator: Kasiarová E.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Geschiedenis van de aardwetenschappen
europeana:record.dc:description: The State Central Mining Archives in Banská Štiavnica (SCMA) supervise about 6 km of archival documents relating to different fields of human activity as well as individual people, phenomena and subjects. Some of these documents may serve for identification or more exact description of different museum objects both in Slovakia and in the world.

Winkler Prins and Stephen K. Donovan (editors)]: The archival documents of the State Central Mining Archives in Banská Stiavnica related to different kinds of museum collections at home and abroad (URN:ISSN:0922-4564) (Volume 4) (Issue 20)
